org.activebpel.rt.config
Class AeConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.config.AeConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeDefaultEngineConfiguration
public abstract class AeConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

A base class for configuration classes (such as the ActiveBPEL Engine Configuration class).

Get a mapped entry in the config with the passed name. Returns null if no map entry found or entry is not a map.

Parameters:

getMapEntry

public java.util.Map getMapEntry(java.lang.String aName,
                                 boolean aCreateFlag)
Retrieve the map entry from the config.

Parameters:
aName - The config entry name.
aCreateFlag - If true and the named map is null, it will be created and added to the config map.

getMapEntry

public java.util.Map getMapEntry(java.lang.String aName,
                                 boolean aCreateFlag,
                                 java.util.Map aConfigEntry)
Retrieve the map entry from the config.

Parameters:
aName - The config entry name.
aCreateFlag - If true and the named map is null, it will be created and added to the config map. aConfigEntry Map to containing entries.

addEntryByPath

public void addEntryByPath(java.lang.String aPath,
                           java.lang.String aSetting)
Descend into the config maps for the given path to set the value.

Parameters:
aPath - The path to the map. The path format will be something like foo/bar/debug where foo and bar are key names for map and debug is the key that will be added to the bar map (with the setting as its value).
aSetting - The value of the custom param.

getEntryByPath

public java.lang.Object getEntryByPath(java.lang.String aPath)
Returns the entry given a path

Parameters:
aPath -
